id: Starting a New Job - Notion template
name: Starting a New Job - Notion template
description: A template for success - show them why they hired you!18+ pages of tools and contentWhether you’re an obsessive planner or you prefer to go with the flow, this template will help you put your best foot forward and ease your transition into your new job.What’s inside?This Notion template contains so much more than productivity tools and habit trackers! It also contains:Advice for starting your job right, from seasoned career expertsSelf development tools to accelerate your career successTemplates
features: Advice for starting your job right, from seasoned career experts; Self development tools to accelerate your career success; Templates and frameworks to form and communicate your ideas more effectively; Worksheets and creative journaling prompts to nurture your personal well-being and make your dreams a reality; Must-dolist for your first week; Easy framework for figuring out how tosucceed in any project; ‘Intro to me’ template to launch yourpersonal brandat work; Guide tonavigating your first meetingwith your manager; Coworker database- so you never call someone the wrong name in front of the CEO!; Action points tomake yourself indispensable
